node.prompt: Good, you've picked up some minerals from that asteroid! Press I to open your inventory and have a look! Maybe you got lucky and got some precious, precious ice! Silly humans and their inefficient lungs!
When you're full up on resources, or running out of air to fuel your meat sack, fly back to the mining station! I'll explain more when you get there, you have fun criminal! F.R.I.E.N.D out!
